20bbdfda-c2cf-46ad-9b8f-1730c88002dd.description: The REA Emerging Leaders Program is an exclusive leadership experience that empowers the success of the next generation of leaders in the property industry. Participants in this program gain access to the knowledge and skills required to be a Daring Leader, as well expert insights and resources from globally renowned speakers to fuel innovative and transformational business thinking.
20bbdfda-c2cf-46ad-9b8f-1730c88002dd.name: REA Group Emerging Leaders Program: 2021 Participant

badge_template_activities.title: Be nominated as an Emerging Leader by their business, based on a set of defined criteria, then selected by REA Group to partake in the exclusive program.
Complete the Best of Dare to Lead™ training program; an empirically based courage-building program for leaders based on the research of Dr. Brené Brown.
Attend and participate in expert-led speaker session/s

0e52748c-3561-4aeb-93da-788fa4797b54.description: The REA All Stars Program is our pinnacle recognition program designed to identify and reward the very best in the sales team. Team members compete for the top spot, driving revenue growth, demonstrating outstanding behaviours and values and being the ultimate in customer service.
0e52748c-3561-4aeb-93da-788fa4797b54.name: REA All Stars - FY21 Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Awarded to those who have achieved outstanding sales results across the year while also consistently demonstrating company values and behaviours.

586e0ab5-87dc-45e2-801f-abdf98929e89.description: The Sales Leaders of Tomorrow Program aims to provide high performing members of the sales group with the opportunity to engage in a transformational experience focused on career and leadership development at both the intrapersonal and professional level.
